Item 2.02 - Results of Operations and Fi.content: Johnson & Johnson completed an exchange offer to finalize the separation of Kenvue Inc. (the "Kenvue Separation"). On August 30, 2023, Johnson & Johnson issued the attached press release (Exhibit 99.1) providing updated financials and 2023 guidance following completion of the Kenvue Separation.

subsections.Exhibit 104: The cover page from this Current Report on Form 8-K, formatted in Inline XBRL.
